title: Hello there!
text: This is Caro Coding. I am a heterotroph organism based in NYC that graduated from Queens College with a Master of Arts in Computer Science and a Bachelor of Science in Electronics Engineering.

I am a passionate robotics enthusiast and have worked in several mobile robot devices from designing and building their electronic circuits to programming their microcontrollers and developing GUIs for their operation.
One of my main interest is building functional, intuitive and beautiful UI and traversing the city on my bicycle.
I develop in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React Native, Python and C++.
